category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_cancel_subs_declaration_request_workflow
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the workflow to instantiate when a "Cancel Substance Declaration Request" action is invoked from the user interface. The default value is "IMDS - Cancel Substance Declaration Request".
